entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is the mother of Draco Malfoy. She is worried about her son's safety and believes that Snape could be a better choice for the task.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who has been tasked by the Dark Lord to kill someone. He seems reluctant to do so but is willing to follow orders.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is Narcissa's son and the one chosen by the Dark Lord for the task. Narcissa believes that Snape would be a better choice.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is the one who has tasked Snape with killing someone. He seems to have a plan in place and wants Draco to try first.

relationships.description: Narcissa believes that Snape could be a better choice for the task than her son, Draco.
The Dark Lord has chosen Draco to try and complete the task first.
Snape is tasked by the Dark Lord with killing someone, but he seems reluctant to do so.
